title: Find Mystic Carrion's Servant
content:
Find Mystic Carrion's Servant Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Baldur's Gate Reward Torch of Revocation

Find Mystic Carrion's Servant

Find Mystic Carrion's Servant is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Find Mystic Carrion's Servant can be acquired during Act 3. This quest can be obtained when you reach Baldur's Gate. All Baldur's Gate quests will be grouped together in your quest journal. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earn mo
